content.title: IgG4-Related Disease in Vascular Surgery
content.description: IgG4-related disease affecting the aorta and major vessels

key_concepts.details: Inflammatory aortic aneurysm, periaortitis, coronary arteritis
Dense lymphoplasmacytic infiltrate, storiform fibrosis, obliterative phlebitis, IgG4+ plasma cells
Elevated serum IgG4 (though not required); often elevated total IgG, IgE
Corticosteroids highly effective; rituximab for refractory cases

content.clinical_significance: Important mimic of inflammatory aortic aneurysm and retroperitoneal fibrosis

primary_sources: Stone JH et al. N Engl J Med 2012
